sentences: Ma ei tea, kas see on tõsi, aga ma usun sina nagunii.
Ta jättis mind ootama ja läks maha, kuid ma ootasin teda alati nagunii.
Ma sain teada, et sul oli õhtu ja pühendus nagunii.
context: 'nagunii' is an Estonian adverb meaning 'anyway' or 'nevertheless'. It's used to express that something happens despite expectations or contrary circumstances, similar to English phrases like 'all the same' or 'just the same'.
